responses: Hello! How can I assist you with your college admission questions today?
Goodbye! Feel free to reach out if you have more questions.
You'll need a completed application, high school transcripts, and standardized test scores. Check our website for specifics!
The Fall deadline is typically January 15th. Early action is November 1st.
Graduation is typically held in mid-May for the Spring semester and mid-December for the Fall semester.
We offer Engineering, Business, CS, and Arts. Would you like to know about a specific one?
Great choice! Our program is top-tier. You can find the specific curriculum on the 'Academics' page.
Tuition varies by residency. Please check the 'Tuition and Fees' page on our site.
